719466f-a.title: Manhattan: Houston Street (East) - Elizabeth Street
719466f-a.text:
East Houston Street, north side, east from and including Elisabeth
Street, showing the clearance created by the demolition of buildings which
formerly stood there, to make way for the construction of the Independent
System Subway (Eighth Ave. subway). Also shown is the Houston Street station
of the Third Ave. Elevated Line, on the Bowery. In the left foreground
appear Nos. 288 and 290 (right to left) Elirabeth Street, adjoining and
north of the N.E. corner of East Houston Street.(The corner is a clearance).
March 12, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
719466f-a.folder: Houston Street (East) & Elizabeth Street, Manhattan, NY

719463f-a.title: Manhattan: Houston Street (East) - Elizabeth Street
719463f-a.text:
East Houston Street, north side, west from Elinabeth Street, to but not
including Mulberry, after crossing Mott Streets. Also shown (right) are
Nos. 281 to 285 Elinabeth Street, at, adjoining and north of the N.W.
corner of East Houston Street. These houses were later demolished to
facilitate the construction of the Independent System Subway (Eighth Ave.
subway); their site is now (1937) being used as a playground and Park.
July 17, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
719463f-a.folder: Houston Street (East) & Elizabeth Street, Manhattan, NY

719642f-a.title: Manhattan: Elizabeth Street - East Houston
719642f-a.text:
Elizabeth Street, west side, north from, but not including East Houst-
on, to and including Bleecker Streets. Shown is the Church of Our Lady
of Loretto, R.C. at No. 307, adjoining the S.W. corner of Prince Street.
February 21, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIOIS.
719642f-a.folder: Elizabeth Street & East Houston, Manhattan, NY

719464f-a.title: Manhattan: Houston Street (East) - Elizabeth Street
719464f-a.text:
East Houston Street, south side, west from (No. 63) but not including
Elirabeth, to Broadway. Note the 9-story Puck Building (with figure) ex-
tending from Mulberry to Lafayette Streets. Clearance in the foreground
is on the north side of East Houston Street.
June 3, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
719464f-a.folder: Houston Street (East) & Elizabeth Street, Manhattan, NY

719467f-a.title: Manhattan: Houston Street (East) - Elizabeth Street
719467f-a.text:
(gR
East Houston Street,isouth side, east from and including Elisabeth
Street, to, but not including the Bowery. Also shown is Elizabeth
Street, east side, south from and including East Houston, to, but not in-
cluding Prince Streets.
June 3, 1933.
L. Sperr.  NO REPRODUCTIONS.
